item.title: Gram sabhas begin across districts
item.description:
<![CDATA[Khammam/Gadwal/Mahabubnagar/Wanaparthy: On Tuesday gram sabhas were held in Upparipally of Ghanpur mandal and Cheekarachettu thanda and Mundri thanda in Peddamandadi mandal. The DC, along with local MLA Thudi Megha Reddy and addi-tional collector (local bodies) Sanchit Gangwar participated as chief guests.
Addressing the gathering the collector stated that field visits were conducted to prepare a list of genuine beneficiaries for welfare schemes. If there are any changes or objections to the li...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
